event.title: Firebase, Kubernetes and Serverless Video Intelligence
event.description:
18:30 - Arrive and interact with other humans!
19:00 - Firebase from within Kubernetes - A show-n-tell from Andre
19:30 - Serverless Video Intelligence - A round up of serverless options in GCP with a live demo from Tim
20:30 - You don't have to go home but you can't stay here :-)

We will also hand out Qwiklabs vouchers so you can try out the code from the serverless demo yourself.

Venue hire and light refreshments are sponsored by www.claranet.co.uk!
